tagline: Get data and update tasks on this project management app.
description: Connect to the Trello Project Management API to get data and update tasks on this project management app. Test an API call and export the code into your app.

args.name: fields

args.info: Board labels name, a string with a length from 0 to 16384.

args.name: color
args.info: Label color or null. Valid value: blue, green, orange, purple, red, yellow.

args.name: name
args.info: Board lists name, a string with a length from 0 to 16384.

args.name: pos
args.info: A position. top, bottom, or a positive number.

args.name: value
args.info: Power Ups value. One of: calendar, cardAging, recap, voting.

args.name: idMember
args.info: An identifier, username, or organization name of member.

args.name: powerUp
args.info: Board power up. One of: calendar, cardAging, recap, voting.
